name: Operation Ducky
description:
Made by Fire duck:

Programmer, Gamewriter: MoosDruide13

Artist: Walle

-----------------------------------------------------------

This game is the result when 2 boys decide to take part of a 72 hour Jam

Made for the Mini Jam77 in 72 hours.

The game is designed to run in fullscreen.

----------------------------------------------------------

The browser version of the game is the original version for the jam.

Every version that is downloadable is edited and are NOT for the jam.
